topics.body:
Yo; I just thought of something: the supreme court is glorious bastards.

What I mean by this is that gay marriage is going to the supreme court in April and has to make a ruling by June.  The reason why the dates are important is that simply put if they rule in favor of repeal, which overwhelming chance they will, we'll be into the USA presidential election process and candidates will be throwing their hats into the ring.  If they made a ruling after the 2016 election there would be a ton of drama in congress with people trying to undue the repeal.  Since by the time they're going to make a ruling will start to get into the presidential election process republicans will be forced to keep their fucking mouths shut on the topic or face potentially losing another election.

Basically:
Supreme court, "gay marriage is legal"
Congress, "undo the supreme court's decisio-. . . Wait. . we have a presidential election coming up?  *zips mouth shut*"
